importantArticles.headline: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, April 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- B2Gold Corp. (TSX: BTO) (NYSE American: BTG) (“B2Gold” or the “Company”) announces that, further to the press release of the Company dated January 13, 2025 (the “Announcement PR”), the Toronto Stock Exchange (the “TSX”) has accepted the notice of B2Gold’s intention to implement a normal course issuer bid (the “NCIB”). The Company’s decision to approve the NCIB is consistent with its amended shareholder return strategy outlined in th
importantArticles.title: B2Gold Announces TSX Approval for Normal Course Issuer Bid

importantArticles.headline: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, April 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- B2Gold Corp. (TSX: BTO) (NYSE American: BTG) (“B2Gold” or the “Company”) announces that, further to the press release of the Company dated January 13, 2025 (the “Announcement PR”), the Toronto Stock Exchange (the “TSX”) has accepted the notice of B2Gold’s intention to implement a normal course issuer bid (the “NCIB”). importantArticles.title: B2Gold Announces TSX Approval for Normal Course Issuer Bid
